title: 2006 Mumbai train blasts: HC acquits all 12 accused; court says prosecution failed to prove case
content: In a significant ruling, the Bombay High Court overturned the death sentences of five men convicted in the 2006 Mumbai train bombings. The court acquitted all twelve accused who were previously convicted by the special trial court in September 2015. Justices Anil Kilor and Shyam Chandak of the special bench quashed and set aside the trial court's verdict.

title: Fake teacher IDs, Rs 30L bribes: How Shalarth IDs became tools of graft; inside govt teacher portal scam
content: A massive fraud has been uncovered in Maharashtra's education system, involving the misuse of the Shalarth portal. Senior education officers allegedly created fake teacher IDs and hired unqualified individuals for bribes, siphoning off an estimated Rs 2,000-3,000 crore. A Special Investigation Team has been formed to probe the scam, with arrests and suspensions already underway.

title: Over 200 planes affected: Why Alaska Airlines has grounded its entire fleet
content: Alaska Airlines grounded its entire fleet of over 200 aircraft on Sunday evening due to an IT outage, according to an FAA notice. The ground stop also affected Horizon Air flights, a regional subsidiary. The airline apologized for the inconvenience and warned of residual impacts throughout the evening, advising passengers to check their flight status.

title: Monsoon session: Income Tax bill, anti-doping law on agenda; full list of key bills
content: The Monsoon Session of Parliament is set to commence, featuring 15 bills for consideration, including key legislation on finance, commerce, and income tax. A new digital attendance system will be implemented for MPs, enhancing transparency. Discussions are anticipated on Operation Sindoor and international relations, alongside debates on crucial policy updates across various sectors.

title: US Green card delay: CEO of MARTA resigns as work permit expires
content: The U.S. Green Card delays are impacting American corporations, forcing experienced executives to resign due to expiring work permits. Collie Greenwood, CEO of MARTA, stepped down after his permit expired, hindering key projects. Despite MARTA's confirmation of his 'imminent' Green Card delivery, Greenwood opted for early retirement.

title: Mumbai soaked again: Heavy rains lash city early morning; Andheri subway shut
content: Mumbai faced disruptions early Wednesday due to heavy rainfall, slowing down city traffic. The Andheri subway closed due to waterlogging. The IMD forecasts partly cloudy skies with moderate rain or thunderstorms. A low-pressure system in the Bay of Bengal is expected to increase rainfall in coastal Maharashtra.

title: 'No one is above the law': Trump shares AI video showing Obama being arrested
content: Donald Trump shared an AI-generated video on Truth Social depicting Barack Obama's arrest by FBI agents in the Oval Office. The deepfake video, originating from TikTok, shows Obama being handcuffed while Trump smiles. It includes Democratic leaders saying, "No one is above the law," followed by Obama in prison, sparking strong reactions on social media.

title: Dan Rivera mystery: No sign of Annabelle doll in hotel room
content: The death of paranormal investigator Dan Rivera in Gettysburg, while on tour with the infamous Annabelle doll, has sparked unease. Although authorities confirmed Annabelle was not present in his hotel room, the timing of his death has rattled believers.

title: Perplexity CEO to youngsters: Spend less time on Instagram, more time on…
content: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas advises young individuals to prioritize mastering AI tools over excessive social media use, emphasizing that AI proficiency will significantly enhance employability. He acknowledges the challenges of adapting to rapidly evolving AI technology, which changes every three to six months.

title: IND vs ENG | Manchester Test: Injuries scuttle India’s preparation
content: India faces injury concerns ahead of the fourth Test in Manchester, with Nitish Kumar Reddy potentially ruled out due to a knee injury. Arshdeep Singh and Akash Deep are also being monitored. Anshul Kamboj has been called up as cover. The team might rely on Shardul Thakur and Washington Sundar to step up, especially with uncertainty around Rishabh Pant's recovery.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 tops 25,000 mark; BSE Sensex surges 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Monday. While Nifty50 was near 24,950, BSE Sensex was down around 50 points.

title: Landslide hits Mata Vaishno Devi Yatra route in Katra; 4 injured
content: Heavy rainfall in Jammu and Kashmir led to a landslide on the Mata Vaishno Devi yatra route in Katra on Monday morning. The incident, occurring near Banganga at Gulshan Ka Langar, injured four pilgrims.

title: Microsoft SharePoint zero-day breach hits 75 servers: Here’s what the company said
content: A critical zero-day vulnerability, CVE-2025-53770, is actively exploited in Microsoft SharePoint, impacting 75 company servers, including major corporations and US government agencies. This flaw allows unauthenticated remote code execution. Microsoft is working on a security update and advises users to enable AMSI, deploy Defender AV, or disconnect servers from the internet.

title: Who was Tommy Oswald? All you need to know about the athlete who died at 33
content: The Australian athletics community mourns the sudden demise of Tommy Oswald, a 33-year-old runner, father, and community leader. Known as 'Australia's nicest bloke,' Oswald's unexpected passing has deeply affected many. He gained recognition for his compassion, notably welcoming his pregnant cousin into his home. Oswald founded Athletes Australia, a large online community, fostering connection among athletes.

title: ‘Saiyaara’: Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda starrer records historic Rs 83 crore debut weekend
content: Mohit Suri's 'Saiyaara,' starring debutants Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, has achieved a historic opening weekend, grossing over Rs 80 crore. Defying expectations, it surpassed Suri's previous records and secured a spot among 2025's top openers. The film's success is attributed to its fresh cast, music, and emotional storytelling, resonating strongly with younger audiences, outperforming several big banner films.

title: ‘Sign your own projects’: Staff room taunt may have pushed Sharda student to suicide
content: Jyoti Jhangra, a BDS student at Sharda University, tragically died by suicide after being accused of forging a professor's signature on her project file. The incident led to her father being called to campus, and despite assurances from the HOD, Jyoti felt targeted by faculty.

title: ‘We are globally the richest ...’: VP Dhankhar bats for unity amid language row
content: Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar has urged national unity amidst ongoing language controversies. He emphasized India's linguistic richness, highlighting Sanskrit, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi, and Marathi. Dhankhar stated languages should unite, not divide, and those using language divisively should embrace Indian culture.

title: IND vs PAK | 'There's one bad egg...': Shahid Afridi breaks silence
content: Shahid Afridi has strongly criticized Indian players for withdrawing from the World Championship of Legends match against Pakistan, emphasizing that sports should remain separate from politics. He lamented the sudden change of heart after the Indian team had already arrived and practiced.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for July 21 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services recommends Vishal Mega Mart and State Bank of India as top stock picks for the week starting July 21, 2025. Vishal Mega Mart aims for expansion with strong store economics, while SBI launched a ₹25,000-crore QIP to support growth and strengthen its capital adequacy, positioning it for sustainable growth.

title: Kirk Cousins dragged into affair scandal as Netflix shades Astronomer CEO
content: Netflix waded into a scandal involving Astronomer CEO Andy Byron. The streaming service used a Kirk Cousins clip about Coldplay. This happened amid affair rumors surrounding Byron. Social media noticed the sly dig. Cousins, known for his wholesome image, got caught in the crossfire. He also faces a QB battle with Michael Penix Jr. Netflix's timing made Cousins trend again.

title: Lakers may waive $9.16 M guard to clear space for Marcus Smart trade
content: The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly planning to waive Shake Milton to create roster space for Marcus Smart, who is expected to sign a two-year deal. This move signifies the Lakers' focus on acquiring experienced veterans and defensive-minded players. The team is navigating cap constraints to improve their roster for a deeper playoff run.

title: Shaquille O’Neal predicts Klay–Megan Thee Stallion romance won’t last long
content: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion's budding romance has captured attention, marked by public appearances and shared workouts. Despite their apparent happiness, Shaquille O'Neal predicts a short-lived relationship, estimating it will last only six weeks. However, Mike Tyson countered, suggesting the couple might have more staying power, considering their connection and compatibility.

title: IND vs PAK | Will India skip another Pakistan clash ? Team owner drops hint
content: The highly anticipated World Championship of Legends (WCL) 2025 clash between India and Pakistan has been cancelled. The decision follows the Indian team's refusal to participate, citing the Pahalgam terror attack in April. Despite India's withdrawal, the tournament will proceed as scheduled. Organizers initially aimed to foster positive memories but acknowledged unintentionally stirring emotions.

title: 'Save me': Man recalls harrowing moment as Puri girl, set ablaze, knocked on door
content: In Odisha's Puri district, a 15-year-old girl was set ablaze by unidentified men and heroically saved by Dukshishyam Senapati, who provided aid and contacted her family after she sought refuge at his home.

title: Justice Varma’s plea to bin inquiry report may face maintainability hurdle in SC
content: Justice Yashwant Varma's petition to quash an inquiry report regarding the discovery of money at his residence faces significant hurdles in the Supreme Court. With over 100 MPs seeking his removal, the petition's maintainability is questioned, especially given the evidence and his delayed response. A PIL further complicates matters, suggesting potential corruption and demanding a police FIR.

title: IPL slapgate | ‘You hit my father...’: Harbhajan on chat with Sreesanth’s daughter
content: Harbhajan Singh, the former Indian off-spinner, expressed deep regret over the 2008 IPL incident where he slapped S. Sreesanth. He revealed a heart-wrenching encounter with Sreesanth's daughter, who expressed her dislike for him due to the incident.

title: Travis Kelce goes solo in LA as Taylor Swift faces family emergency
content: Pop singer Taylor Swift is helping her father, Scott Swift, recover after heart surgery. Her partner, Travis Kelce, was seen driving in Los Angeles. Kelce is supporting Swift and her family during this time. He is also preparing for Kansas City Chiefs training camp. Kelce and his brother are pausing their podcast.

title: Dwyane Wade shows peaceful retreat after Kaavia’s ‘country girl’ moment
content: Dwyane Wade shares glimpses of his family moments. He posts videos of daughter Kaavia with a pony. Gabrielle Union is also seen in the video. Wade also shares a serene sea view from his vacation home. He emphasizes the importance of freedom for Kaavia. Wade and Union foster compassion and individuality in their parenting.

title: Shannon Sharpe’s $50 M assault suit settles; fans question his ‘guilty’ tag
content: Shannon Sharpe has settled a $50 million sexual assault lawsuit filed by a 20-year-old woman, raising questions among fans. While Sharpe's legal team affirmed a consensual relationship, the settlement has fueled speculation about his guilt. Both parties acknowledge a long-term, tumultuous relationship, leading to a mutually agreed-upon resolution and dismissal of the lawsuit.

title: Filmmaker Karan Johar slams troll for calling him ‘nepo kid ka daijaan’
content: Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda's debut film 'Saiyaara' is receiving widespread acclaim, with Karan Johar praising the movie and its team. However, a netizen trolled Johar, calling him 'nepo kid ka daijaan,' leading to a sharp response from the filmmaker. Johar defended the film's talent and urged the troll to focus on their own work and avoid spreading negativity.

title: 'Those trying to defame kanwar yatra will face action': Yogi Adityanath
content: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath has warned that miscreants posing as Kanwariyas to incite violence during the pilgrimage will face strict action, including public identification. He accused anti-social elements of tarnishing the Yatra's image and urged genuine devotees to expose them.

title: Girl, 15, burnt in Odisha airlifted to Delhi; cops suspect self-immolation
content: A 15-year-old girl in Odisha's Puri district, who was allegedly set on fire by three masked men, has been airlifted to AIIMS New Delhi for treatment. The victim, a class 9 dropout, sustained 70-75% burn injuries after being attacked near a river embankment.

title: ‘Adani group to invest Rs 96,000 crore in airports business over 5 years’
content: Adani Group plans to invest nearly Rs 1 lakh crore in its airport business in India over the next five years, focusing on infrastructure and real estate development. The investment will primarily target Navi Mumbai Airport, Mumbai Airport, and expansions in Ahmedabad, Jaipur, Thiruvananthapuram, and Guwahati. The group aims to capitalize on India's growth potential in the aviation sector.

title: Israeli PM Netanyahu suffering from food poisoning
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is currently resting at his residence after being diagnosed with food poisoning, his office confirmed. Doctors have treated the 75-year-old leader for intestinal inflammation and dehydration. Consequently, his ongoing corruption trial has been postponed, with the next hearing scheduled for September.

title: Construction of 130-km alternative road to DBO outpost in Ladakh reaches final stages
content: India is nearing completion of a new 130-km road to Daulat Beg Oldie (DBO) in eastern Ladakh, expected to be fully operational by Oct-Nov 2026. The Border Roads Organisation (BRO) has completed significant portions of the road, enhancing military mobility to the frontier. This alternative route aims to improve connectivity and reduce PLA's ability to track Indian military movements.

title: Travis Kelce mocked over Taylor Swift's alleged control
content: Travis and Jason Kelce are pausing their 'New Heights' podcast as Travis focuses on football training. Jason humorously shared that his wife, Kylie, keeps him in line with chores. Adding to the fun, Eric Fisher playfully inquired if Taylor Swift assigns Travis chores, to which Travis responded with laughing emojis.

title: Border agent shot in NYC park: Suspect had deportation order
content: An off-duty US Border Patrol agent was shot in the face during a robbery in a New York City park. The suspect, Miguel Francisco Mora Nunez, an illegal immigrant with a prior deportation order, was apprehended. The agent returned fire, wounding Mora, who has a history of arrests and was previously released due to overcrowding despite his immigration status.

title: PM Modi in UK this week, FTA & boosting ties top on agenda
content: PM Narendra Modi will visit the UK this week. He will meet Keir Starmer to discuss trade, technology, defence, and education. A free trade agreement is expected to be formalised. Modi will also visit Maldives as guest of honour on their Independence Day. This marks a turnaround in relations since President Muizzu assumed office.

title: Cardiac medication sales shoot up 50% in five years
content: India is witnessing a significant surge in heart disease, evidenced by a 50% increase in cardiac medication sales between 2021 and 2025. Experts attribute this rise to better awareness, revised hypertension guidelines, and an aging population. Increased access to care and diagnostic tools also contribute to the higher detection and treatment rates of cardiovascular issues.

title: AI-based facial identification to track sex abusers at railway stations
content: To curb crimes against women, the Union government informed the Supreme Court about plans to implement AI-based facial recognition at major railway stations, including Mumbai CST and New Delhi, as the National Database on Sexual Offenders crosses 20 lakh entries.

title: Right decision will be taken at right time: Uddhav on Raj
content: Uddhav Thackeray has affirmed the alliance with his cousin Raj Thackeray, emphasizing their commitment to Maharashtra's progress and Marathi identity. He stated that discussions are ongoing and expressed readiness to act in the interest of Marathi people, language, and culture. Thackeray also addressed concerns about potential local-level decisions by Congress within the MVA alliance for municipal elections.

title: NMC again threatens action against medical colleges not paying stipend
content: Despite repeated threats in 2023 and 2024, the National Medical Commission (NMC) has again warned medical colleges about failing to pay stipends to interns and resident doctors. The NMC threatens penalties, including financial fines and suspension of admissions, for non-compliance. Previous surveys revealed widespread stipend non-payment, yet no action has been taken against defaulting colleges.

title: Kristin Cabot caught in viral video: CEO quits, wife reacts; scandal rocks Boston elite
content: Kristin Cabot, Astronomer's HR executive, is at the center of a scandal after a video of her cuddling CEO Andy Byron went viral, leading to his resignation and social media fallout. Cabot is reportedly married into the wealthy Cabot family of Boston, known for their historical prominence and roots in the carbon black industry.

title: 11-year-old girl's testimony sends mom, 4 others to life for killing dad
content: In Aligarh, a woman, her mother, and three siblings received life sentences for the 2022 murder of her husband, Shafiq. The conviction followed testimony from the victim's 11-year-old daughter, who witnessed the crime. The court heard how the family attacked Shafiq after a domestic dispute, hid his body for two days, and then dumped it near a water tank.

title: KIIT's unlawful acts led to suicides: UGC panel
content: A UGC fact-finding committee has implicated KIIT University in the suicides of two students, citing illegal activities and criminal liability. The report highlights failures in handling sexual harassment complaints, substandard hostel conditions, and excessive student intake. The UGC is considering freezing expansion and pursuing departmental action against responsible officials due to the university's negligence.

title: Congress MPs move adjournment notices in Parliament to discuss Pahalgam attack, Operation Sindoor
content: Opposition is seeking to corner the government over issues like the Pahalgam attack, U.S. President Donald Trump’s repeated claims of mediating a ceasefire with Pakistan following Operation Sindoor and the Special Intensive Review of electoral rolls in Bihar

title: Waterlogging in parts of Mumbai after heavy rains; traffic affected
content: After a reduced rain spell earlier this month and sunny skies for the last few days, the metropolis witnessed heavy overnight showers

title: Andhra liquor scam: Former CM Jagan one among those who received kickbacks from distillery companies, says CID remand report
content: Police named about 40 persons, including a retired IAS officer, officers of APSBCL, one MP, former MP, public representatives and others as accused in the scam

title: 7/11 Mumbai train blasts case: High Court acquits all 12 accused; says prosecution ‘utterly failed’ to prove case
content: The judgment comes 19 years after the terror attack that shook the city's Western Railway network, resulting in the loss of over 180 lives and leaving several others injured

title: Landslip hits Vaishno Devi track in J&K’s Reasi; four pilgrims injured
content: The landslip was triggered by heavy rains which lashed Katra town, the base camp for the pilgrims visiting the shrine atop Trikuta hills, they said

title: Kerala man taken into custody for suspected strangulation of woman in lodge at Aluva
content: The accused, identified as Binu, 37, a truck driver from Neriamangalam, reportedly made a video call to his friends and exhibited the body of the woman who he claimed to have murdered

title: Three militants among six held in Manipur
content: A self-styled sergeant major of the banned Prepak was arrested from his residence at Kontha Ahallup in Imphal East district on July 19, 2025.

title: Parliament Monsoon Session Day 1 LIVE updates: Monsoon Session will celebrate the victory of Indian soldiers in Operation Sindoor, says PM Modi
content: Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju made it clear that the final call on discussions in Parliament will be taken by the Business Advisory Committees of the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha.

title: ‘Why did he call Parliament session?’ asks Congress MP Pramod Tiwari on PM Modi’s trip to U.K. and Maldives
content: “The Prime Minister should look at his attendance as to how many days he attended the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha. Our Prime Minister is not serious about democracy,” said the Congress MP

title: Government announces ₹1 crore cash award for Rahul Sipligunj
content: Revanth Reddy had announced a cash reward of ₹10 lakh for the young singer when he was TPCC president

title: Odisha self-immolation case: Crime branch says student's complaint not validated by enquiry team
content: Crime Branch DG Vinaytosh Mishra said its sleuths found discrepancies in the statements of witnesses in the case

title: Six more Eklavya Model Residential Schools to start in Tripura in August, total 21 sanctioned
content: An official from the tribal welfare department stated that there are currently 2700 tribal students enrolled in the six existing EMRS, and this number is expected to double with the establishment of the six new schools

title: Man stabs wife to death at Government Hospital in Karur
content: The accused, a resident of Kulithalai, intially attacked his wife at home, and as she was receiving treatment in the hospital, he visited her and stabbed her again

title: Family of five found dead in Ahmedabad
content: Three children were among the dead too as police are examining whether the deaths were the result of a deliberate act by one or both parentsnce

title: Veteran pilot Sandhu joins Air India plane crash probe as domain expert
content: Captain Sandhu, who was also a designated examiner for the Boeing 787-8 fleet at Air India, had taken delivery of the now-crashed 787-8 plane — VT-ANB — in 2013

title: Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava to be sworn-in as Madras High Court Chief Justice on July 21
content: Tamil Nadu Governor R.N. Ravi is scheduled to administer the oath of office to the judge at the ceremony set to commence at 4 p.m. in the Bharathiar Mandapam in the Raj Bhavan campus

title: Congress-IUML mounts pressure on Kerala government to hold Vellappally Natesan accountable for stoking religious schism
content: CPI(M) scrambles to distance itself from the remarks of SNDP Yogam leader who also heads the Left Democratic Front-backed Renaissance Protection Samiti formed in 2019 to further progressive and secular values

title: Haryana govt blames Opposition parties for making misleading assertions on crime rise
content: The State government said that under its ‘Zero Tolerance for Crime’ policy, it has taken significant and effective measures to strengthen law and order in the State

title: Maharashtra Special Public Security Bill: joint committee didn’t follow process properly, alleges Congress
content: The joint committee consisted of 25 members and was headed by Maharashtra revenue minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule

title: Nainar Nagenthran flays DMK government over poor cleanliness in cities
content: He points out that Chennai and Madurai have ranked 38 and 40 in the national-level cleanliness survey, Swachh Survekshan 2024-25

title: Sanjay Raut slams Maharashtra’s Public Safety Bill as tool to suppress dissent
content: In an editorial column Rokhthok, published on Shiv Sena (UBT)‘s mouthpiece Saamana, MP Sanjay Raut criticised the newly passed Maharashtra Special Public Security Bill, calling it a “BJP Suraksha Bill” aimed at stifling opposition and curbing democratic protest.

title: M.P. receives investment proposals over ₹11,000 crore from Spain and Dubai, says CM Yadav
content: “The total proposals received amounted to ₹11,119 crore that are expected to create more than 14,000 employment opportunities in the State”

title: Obsession for land: Odisha forest officer found to have purchased 115 plots
content: Nityananda Nayak, Divisional Forest Officer of the Kendu Leaf Division in Keonjhar, has been placed atop Vigilance Directorate’s list of corrupt officials who have amassed assets

title: CoinDCX hit by $44.2 million security breach; founders say customer funds unaffected, safe
content: CoinDCX co-founders Sumit Gupta and Neeraj Khandelwal took to the social media platform X to address the situation, confirming that the attack was the result of a sophisticated server breach, targeting an internal wallet, not the ones holding customer assets

title: India must shun lethargy to take global leadership role: Ram Madhav
content: There is confusion all around, and India must understand where the world is going, he said and stressed that becoming a ‘Vishwa Guru’ requires more than just romantic notions to play a role in the global order

title: India records 18 lakh new brain stroke cases every year, nationwide campaign launched
content: The campaign has been launched by the ISA in collaboration with the Indian Association of Physicians-Hyderabad Chapter and the Society for Emergency Medicine India.

title: Bonalu transforms Lal Darwaza into a spectacle of faith, colour
content: Women, adorned in traditional attire and jewellery, carried bonams, decorated pots filled with cooked rice, milk and jaggery on their heads an offering symbolising gratitude and a prayer for protection from misfortune and disease

title: CBI-backed Interpol Red Notices doubled since 2023 with India's diplomatic, tech push
content: Since 2023, the number of Red Notices issued on India's request spiralled with remarkable alacrity — 100 notices in 2023, 107 in 2024 and 56 in the first six months of 2025

title: Integrated bus terminal at Karikkamuri in Kochi runs into rough weather
content: Transport Minister says substantial investment will be needed to fill the largely slushy site to prevent waterlogging. He also cites uncertainty over securing adequate funds for the project and adds that prime land owned by the KSRTC will have to be handed over to Vyttila Mobility Hub Society ‘in return for land that is of far less value or usability’

title: MPs of DMK’s allies demand office space in their constituencies
content: They allege that they are being forced to rent buildings and are unable to meet the people and discharge their duties

title: Tejashwi seeks support from Opposition and ruling parties over SIR in Bihar
content: In the letter, Mr. Yadav says the ongoing SIR in Bihar has shaken the very foundation of democracy through large-scale disenfranchisement

title: Parliament Monsoon Session LIVE: PM Modi Praises Op Sindoor In His Address Ahead Of Monsoon Session
content: Parliament Monsoon Session 2025 LIVE Updates: The Congress is likely to seek a response to US President Donald Trump's claims about mediating a ceasefire between India and Pakistan in May.

title: 'America Feels Scary': Ellen DeGeneres Blames Trump For Moving To UK
content: Ellen DeGeneres said she moved to the UK shortly after the 2024 presidential election results were announced in November.

title: Coastal Charm To Tech Ambition: Goa Rolls Out AI Mission 2027
content: The Pramod Sawant government has rolled out Goa AI Mission 2027, a visionary roadmap to build an inclusive and future-ready Artificial Intelligence ecosystem, officials said.

title: Delhi Wakes Up To Cloudy Skies, Rain Likely In The Day
content: It was a cloudy Monday morning in the national capital with the minimum temperature settling at 27.2 degrees Celsius, officials said.

title: Sexual Assault Case Filed Against BJP MLA Prabhu Chavan's Son
content: A sexual assault case was registered on Sunday against Pratik Chavan, son of BJP MLA Prabhu Chavan based on a complaint lodged at the Bidar Women's Police Station, police sources said.

title: Sensex, Nifty Open Flat Amid Global Cues, India-US Trade Deal Awaited
content: The Indian equity market opened almost flat on Monday amid mixed cues from global markets, as investors continue to look for some positive news on the interim India-US trade deal.

title: 4 Injured As Landslide Hits Vaishno Devi Old Track In Jammu And Kashmir
content: A landslide struck the old track to the Vaishno Devi shrine in Reasi district of Jammu and Kashmir on Monday, leaving at least four pilgrims injured, officials said.

title: Chaos In Mumbai After Heavy Rain, Roads Waterlogged, Andheri Subway Shut
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has issued an 'orange' alert for extremely heavy rainfall in Mumbai and Raigad today.

title: PM Modi Wishes Mallikarjun Kharge On His Birthday, Prays For His Long Life
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday extended birthday greetings to Congress National President Mallikarjun Kharge, wishing him a long and healthy life.

title: Congress Student Leader Arrested For 19-Year-Old's Rape In Odisha Hotel
content: Udit Pradhan, the president of the Congress' students' wing, National Students' Union of India in Odisha, has been arrested for allegedly raping a 19-year-old engineering student in Bhubaneswar

title: US To Bihar, Opposition Ready With Laundry List As Monsoon Session Begins
content: Parliament is set for a stormy monsoon session, with the Opposition, spearheaded by the Congress, ready to corner the government on multiple issues, ranging from Pahalgam attack to electoral rolls in Bihar.

title: Video Shows Grand Celebration For Drug Peddler's Homecoming After Bail
content: On July 16, after Kamran Mohammad Khan was released from Thane Central Jail, his former prison inmates and 35 others assembled near the jail to celebrate.

title: Delta Pilot "Aggressively" Moves To Avoid B-52 Bomber, Then Apologises
content: The pilot apologised to passengers after landing, ABC said in a report Sunday, citing a recording of remarks by the pilot, who it didn't identify.

title: Over 90 Palestinians Seeking Aid Killed By Israeli Army, Says Gaza Agency
content: Eighty were killed as truckloads of aid arrived in the north, while nine others were reported shot near an aid point close to Rafah in the south.

title: Netanyahu Suffers Dehydration After Eating Spoiled Food, Recovering At Home
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is recovering at home after being diagnosed with intestinal inflammation caused by spoiled food.

title: IndiGo Flight Returns To Tirupati After Circling In Air For 40 Minutes
content: A Hyderabad-bound IndiGo flight on Sunday allegedly suffered a technical glitch and circled in the air for about 40 minutes before returning to Tirupati safely.

title: Japan's Governing Alliance Loses Upper House Elections
content: The loss is another blow to Ishiba's coalition, making it a minority in both houses following its October defeat in the lower house election, and worsening Japan's political instability.

title: Donald Trump Posts AI Video Of Barack Obama's Arrest: "No One Is Above Law"
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday stepped up his attack on Barack Obama by posting an AI-generated video of the FBI arresting the former President in the Oval Office.

title: Video: Man Laughs As His Pit Bull Bites Child Inside Auto-Rickshaw In Mumbai
content: An 11-year-old boy was bitten by a Pit Bull after it was intentionally unleashed on him by its owner in Mumbai's eastern suburb.

title: FIR against fake investment firm misusing name of Premji Invest
content: There is also an android app named PREMJIEX on Google Playstore and several WhatsApp groups under the same name, which is suspected to be created by the same fraudsters

title: DMK treating Vanniyar community as mere vote bank during elections: Anbumani Ramadoss
content: He charges Chief Minister M.K. Stalin with betraying the Vanniyar community and alleges that he has been lying about State governments not having the power to conduct a caste census

title: INTUC asks Centre for invitation to tripartite meetings, blames Air India crash on privatisation
content: Congress trade union calls for the establishment of cooperatives to protect workers against exploitation by platforms and asks why no FIR registered or punitive action taken in Air India crash case

title: Upendra Kushwaha urges CM Nitish to transfer JD-(U)’s responsibility to his son Nishant
content: Mr. Kushwaha expressed apprehension that delay in transferring the responsibility can cause irreparable loss to the party asserting that perhaps such a loss which can never be compensated.

title: ‘A useful tool’: annual share of abstentions in India’s U.N. votes at all-time high
content: Abstentions provide emerging and middle powers like India the opportunity to express themselves more freely, rather than merely going along with the consensus or voting against it, says former Permanent Representative of India to the U.N. T.S. Tirumurti

title: Over 58% Dalit voters in Bihar think unemployment is biggest poll issue: survey
content: The survey was conducted and released by the National Confederation of Dalit and Adivasi Associations also found that more than 27.4% Dalit voters in Bihar have ‘no trust’ in the Election Commission

title: Congress leaders detained in Jammu as police foil street march for J&K Statehood
content: Congress accuses J&K police of “manhandling” Rajouri MLA Iftkhar Ahmed; calls for probe into police action; during Monsoon Session of Parliament, INDIA bloc plans to raise demand for immediate restoration of Statehood

title: Centre to form multi-sectoral team in Himachal to assess disaster vulnerability
content: Team to comprise experts from NDMA, IITs, CBRI, and other institutions; Shah cites rising frequency of natural calamities in the State

title: The Tamil Nadu police to roll out mobile application to collect mandatory audio-visual evidence
content: The e-Sakshaya application will also help the police upload photographs of crime scenes or witnesses and generate secure, geo-tagged, time-stamped evidence with hash verification

title: Renovation of KSRTC’s Ernakulam bus stand on cards, say officials
content: The agency had been at the receiving end of public ire over the shoddy condition of the bus stand complex and its premises, which get waterlogged even after a brief spell of rain; the renovation works are expected to be completed in another 10 months

title: Tigress, tigress burning bright
content: From January to June this year, at least 22 people have lost their lives in Maharashtra’s Chandrapur forest circle to human-wildlife conflict. With 347 tigers in the area and each not having sufficient space due to urbanisation, forest officials say they can only increase surveillance and warning systems. Snehal Mutha reports on the relationship between the people who live there, the tigers, and the government

title: Tamil Nadu govt. prepares list of officers for DGP’s post
content: The list of 8 eligible officers is expected to be dispatched this week. In the order of seniority, DGPs Seema Agrawal, Rajeev  Kumar, and Sandeep Rai Rathore top the list. All the three officers have had a stint in the Central government on deputation

title: Inaction of ISRO leadership in extinguishing spy case controversy remains a mystery, says former Ambassador T.P. Sreenivasan
content: T.P. Sreenivasan releases Chaaram: Chaara Caseinte Pinnamburam, a book by journalist John Mundakkayam on espionage controversy

title: ‘Not one of us’: Congress leaders’ patience with Shashi Tharoor running low
content: Former KPCC president K. Muraleedharan said Congress workers would boycott Mr. Tharoor and not invite him to party functions in Thiruvananthapuram.

title: CM says Karnataka will take up issue of GST notices to small traders with Centre
content: A section of the small and micro traders in the State have taken exception to getting notices with respect to taxes based on their transactions via UPI

title: Andhra Pradesh liquor scam: my son will come clean and prove the rulers wrong, says Peddireddi Ramachandra Reddy
content: Alleging that the NDA government is harassing Midhun Reddy, the Punganur MLA accuses Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu, HRD Minister Lokesh and Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan of hatching a conspiracy

title: Be curious, creative and critical in thinking,  Cognizant co-founder tells IIT graduates
content: Lakshmi Narayanan urges IIT Tirupati students to be original, value-driven and socially conscious; JSW Chairman Sajjan Jindal highlights role of youth in realising ‘Viksit Bharat’ vision

title: Cattle traders in Maharashtra to launch boycott amid ‘harassment’
content: Members of the Muslim Qureshi community condemn the violent attacks on cattle and meat traders and transporters by gau rakshaks; community body has announced an indefinite trade boycott from today and has also met the DGP seeking police protection for members

title: Bengaluru police personnel’s silent cry for help answered by mental well-being programme
content: The mental health initiative of the Bengaluru city police, designed to support personnel facing emotional distress, has helped 43 officers dealing with addiction, family crises, depression, and identity-related challenges.

title: Punjab police busts BKI terror module linked to grenade attacks in Patiala
content: Three arrested for targeting police posts; foreign-based handlers identified, further attacks were allegedly being planned

title: TDP will seek discussion on ‘A.P. liquor scam’ in  Parliament, says MP Sri Krishna Devarayalu
content: It warrants a serious debate considering the scale of irregularities and money laundering that has allegedly taken place in the conduct of liquor business during the YSRCP rule, he asserts

title: Andhra Pradesh government scouting for suitable land for proposed Lulu mall in Vijayawada
content: Three locations under consideration as ₹1,222 crore project gets SIPB nod, say officials; opposition mounts over use of APSRTC land

title: Quadcopter loses connection during training sortie, falls in open area in Ambala
content: The Army authorities and Air Force personnel also reached there. They took the drone into their possession

title: Chief Minister calls on Governor, raises slew of issues
content: The meeting marks the first formal interaction between the Chief Minister and the Governor since the ‘Bharat Mata’ controversy flared up

title: Tribal man dies allegedly after Congress’ ambulance-blocking protest in Vithura
content: CPI(M) workers take out a protest march to the residence of Leader of the Opposition, holding the Congress responsible for Binu’s death

title: Jagadish Shettar says internal conflict is weakening Congress govt. in State
content: D.K. Shivakumar left the stage after his speech at the Sadhana Samavesha indicating that everything is not right within the Cong. govt., says BJP MP

title: Mysuru event was held to floor DKS, says BJP
content: Leader of Opposition in the Assembly R. Ashok said the public meeting had exposed the internal rift within Congress

title: Massive quake: 6.2 magnitude tremors hit Alaska; no damage reported
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world . read More 10 daily habits that every child should adopt to drastically improve academic performance Munmun Dutta’s chic looks in black and white .

title: Scheffler's unique dominance over golf continues at Open Championship
content: Scheffler's march on Royal Portrush was a masterclass and proof that his approach is unlike anyone else's.

title: NFLPA's Tretter to resign amid union overhaul
content: NFLPA chief strategy officer JC Tretter is resigning from his position and has withdrawn himself from consideration for the interim executive director position.

title: Trump aims at stadium over Commanders' name
content: President Donald Trump is threatening to hold up a new stadium deal for Washington's NFL team if it does not restore its old name and is calling for Cleveland's baseball team to revert to its former name as well.

title: No drama: Scheffler adds The Open, 3rd Slam leg
content: Scottie Scheffler captured the third leg of the career Grand Slam, cruising to a four-stroke victory in the Open Championship for his fourth win in a major.

title: Knueppel-led Hornets win 1st summer league title
content: Kon Knueppel, the fourth pick in this year's draft, scored 21 points and Charlotte held off a Sacramento rally to beat the Kings 83-78 on Sunday for the Hornets' first NBA summer league title.

title: 'Progressing' Clark likely out for Fever Tuesday
content: Caitlin Clark, who has missed 10 games because of soft tissue injuries, is unlikely to play on Tuesday vs. the New York Liberty, and will undergo additional testing after suffering a right groin injury, Indiana Fever coach Stephanie White said.

title: Cowboys' Smith: Super Bowl still the expectation
content: Pro Bowl guard Tyler Smith said the expectations for the Dallas Cowboys this season remain what they've always been: "Super Bowl champions."

title: No. 1 running back Cooper commits to Longhorns
content: Texas continued its recruiting tear Sunday by securing the commitment of Derrek Cooper, the top-ranked running back in the 2026 class and the seventh-ranked prospect overall.

title: Reports: MLB looking into Braves coach's actions
content: According to multiple reports, MLB is investigating Saturday's occurrence from the Yankees' 12-9 victory, when Atlanta Braves coach Eddie Perez pointed to his head while conversing with New York's Jazz Chisholm Jr., while the All-Star was on second base.

title: 💎 Eagles' Super Bowl ring has pop-out wings
content: The Eagles' Super Bowl LIX rings feature a hidden button that, when pressed, extends the wings on either side, revealing coach Nick Sirianni's saying, "You can't be great without the greatness of others."

title: Inside the Vikings' creative plan that saved J.J. McCarthy's lost rookie season
content: A knee injury kept the No. 10 pick off the field, but McCarthy spent the season preparing in unique ways to be the 2025 starter.

title: What's next for Max Holloway and Paulo Costa after UFC 318?
content: ESPN MMA reporter Brett Okamoto plays matchmaker and predicts the next move for Max Holloway and other stars from UFC 318.

title: UFC 318: Poirier retires, Holloway impresses and the prelims are ... must-see?
content: Max Holloway and Dustin Poirier set the bar high for finale fights, even after the undercard showed out.

title: Pacquiao wants to fight again: Can Romero or Mayweather be next?
content: Manny Pacquiao wants to fight again, and he has a few ideas for his next bout before the end of the year.

title: Euro 2025 quarterfinal talking points: Berger's wonder save, semifinal predictions
content: The 2025 UEFA Women's European Championship is on to the semifinals. But what stood out for our reporters?

title: How every five-star college football recruit fits at his new school
content: There are 23 five-stars in the class of 2026. We look at how they got to their teams and what they'll do in college.

title: From Kevin Durant's Team Durant to Carmelo Anthony's Team Melo, these next-gen AAU stars got next
content: NBA stars such as Kevin Durant and Carmelo Anthony sponsor their own high school AAU shoe-circuit teams.

title: A glimpse of what was to come: Stars who have showed out at Peach Jam
content: Before these stars went to college basketball and the NBA, they showed their stuff at the Nike Peach Jam.

title: Five overreactions before 2025 NFL season: Commanders win NFC East? Chiefs lose AFC West?
content: Is the Bucs QB destined for a massive new contract? Will the Commanders own the NFC East? We're judging offseason overreactions.

title: AFC North: Ravens to three-peat? Rodgers to snap Tomlin's playoff skid?
content: The division is loaded with intrigue and talent, from Lamar Jackson to Joe Burrow and, now, Aaron Rodgers.

title: Timeline: Caitlin Clark's injury-riddled first half of the WNBA season
content: Three separate injuries have sidelined the Indiana point guard and All-Star for 10 regular-season WNBA games.

title: Rashford arrives in Barcelona ahead of loan move
content: Marcus Rashford landed in Barcelona on Sunday ahead of completing a season-long loan move from Manchester United.

title: Núñez scores 14-minute hat trick in Liverpool win
content: Darwin Núñez scored three goals in 14 first-half minutes for Liverpool as they beat Stoke City 5-0 in a behind-closed-doors friendly on Sunday.

title: Sources: Utd close on Mbeumo before U.S. tour
content: Man United are hopeful of completing the signing of Bryan Mbeumo in time to be part of their preseason tour of the U.S., sources have told ESPN.

title: Carter subject to racist abuse at Euro 2025
content: England defender Jess Carter said she has been subject to racial abuse during Euro 2025 and will step back from social media as a result.

title: Gabriel: This year will be different for Arsenal
content: Gabriel Magalhães revealed he signed a new contract with Arsenal because he believes "this season will be different" in the club's pursuit of trophies.

title: Messi scores 2, sets up 2 as Miami routs Red Bulls
content: Lionel Messi had two goals and two assists to lead Inter Miami CF to a bounce-back 5-1 win over the host New York Red Bulls on Saturday night in Harrison, New Jersey.

title: Source: USMNT's Sargent close to Wolfsburg move
content: USMNT forward Josh Sargent is on the verge of joining Bundesliga side Wolfsburg for a deal worth in excess of €21 million, a source has told ESPN.

title: USWNT's Rodman returns to training with Spirit
content: United States forward Trinity Rodman returned to training with the Washington Spirit on Saturday for the first time in three months.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United try to gazump Arsenal for Gyökeres
content: Manchester United have made a last-ditch attempt to steal Viktor Gyökeres from under the noses of Arsenal. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: From Skylar Diggins to Eric Gordon: Ranking Indiana's top high school hoopers since 2000
content: As part of SportsCenter's "50 States in 50 Days" tour, we're spotlighting the top boys and girls hoopers to come out of Indiana based on high school career achievements.

title: Bihar roll revision: 11,000 'not traceables' electors could be illegal immigrants; EC wary
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‘prime’ political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India’s neighbourhood. title: Why Drake Maye can be a top-10 QB in 2025
content: in 11 starts from Week 6 to Week 17, Drake Maye threw for 2,254 yards, 15 touchdowns and 10 interceptions . that translated to an average of 16.0 fantasy points per game in those starts, which would have ranked just outside the top 12 quarterbacks over a full season . Maye has all the makings of a top-10 fantasy quarterback .
